name: Name
manualAddNewNote: Add file manually with the file extension inside {notebook}
manualPlaceholder: Full file name with the extension
shareNoteInstruction: Generate a sharable link. Note that they will only be able to view the note only.
hideNoteDateTimeHelp: Don't show date and time in the user interface when listing notes
standardISOTime: Use ISO standard date and time
standardISOTimeHelp: Dates as YYYY-MM-DD and time using 24 hour clock as Thh:mm:ss
spaceParaHelp: Automatically put some spacing between paragraphs
alwaysCodeView: Use code view for all files?
alwaysCodeViewHelp: Use a plain text editor view for all files including markdown files?
